segments.text: I hear you're being sent to Madrid for the annual conference . Is that right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it would be my first trip overseas . Actually , it's going to be my first time leaving the country .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you serious ? You haven't even been anywhere on vacation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I have never vacationed anywhere exotic . But even if I don't get a chance to travel on my personal time , at least I can travel on company time !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , being able to go to the conference sounds like such a great opportunity . Have you applied at the embassy for a visa yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it wasn't too hard to get . All I had to do was fill out the paperwork and pay the application fee .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You leave next Tuesday , right ? What time is your flight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My flight departs at 7 am . I have everything except for my luggage ready .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If your flight is leaving so early , I can take you to the airport and see you off . I'll still be able to make it into the office by 9 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would be great ! Thanks a lot !
segments.speaker: S2
